steps.name: When  user opens LMS  portal link "https://lms-frontend-phase2.herokuapp.com/login"
Then  User should see the Login page title "LMS"
When  User enters Username as "" and Password as ""
Then  User clicks on Login button with expected status as "Both Fail"

steps.name: Then  User should see the LMS Home page on successful login status "Both Fail"
